name: Jeffrey_Marsh
text:
Jeffrey Marsh
Jeffrey Marsh was the husband of Evelyn Marsh, a woman James Hurley met while drifting in a town outside Twin Peaks.
Biography
Marsh returned home to his wife one day in March 1989, and he later abused her in the evening.
A couple of days later, Jeffrey met James Hurley, who had been staying with the Marsh family to make repairs to Jeffrey's car. Jeffrey then decided to take a ride in the car.
In the evening, he died in a car accident arranged by Evelyn and her lover, Malcolm Sloan.
